name: Flying Owl - Womans Tee
description:
Design: Flying Owl

Colour: Midnight blue print on an oatmeal coloured tee.

Fabric: 150GSM 100% Combed Cotton

Style: A comfy shirt with a scooped neck, capped sleeves, curved tails and side seamed for a flattering tailored fit. The fabric is pre-shrunk to minimise shrinkage and features a double needle bottom hem and sleeves for extra hold. This fabric is soft and light. A top quality, yet ethically made tee
This tee was printed with water based, non-toxic inks

name: Chequered Chess Piece - Mens Tee
description:
Design: Chequered chess piece

Colour: cream print on an asphalt tee.

Fabric: 180GSM 100% Combed Cotton

Style: A comfy and bold tee, featuring a contrasting black pocket and large chequered chess piece in a bold off white colour. This tee is Geekery at its finest.  The tee itself is side seamed for a flattering tailored fit, while shoulder to shoulder tape and double needled bottom hem and sleeves help keep this tee durable but stylish. The fabric is pre-shrunk to minimise shrinkage. The fabric is soft and light. A top quality, yet ethically made tee
This tee was printed with water based, non-toxic inks

name: *Bespoke* Zine - By hand with heart. - Issue  5
description:
*Bespoke* Zine - By hand with heart. - Issue  5
*bespoke* is a lovely little Australian zine all about handmade, vintage, photography, art, micro-business, eco-friendly goodness and much more – all in a sweet little A5 sized package that you can take anywhere!
Independently created, professionally printed in full-colour, with 42 internal pages brimming with crafty goodness!
**Issue 5 Features**
Thrive – Cherie Interro
Artist Feature – Emma Dalzell
Tutorials – How to make a belt!
Collaborations Feature – The power of creative collaborations
-King Billy and Ruby Victoria
-Exquisite Corpse by Loose-Ld
-LilaRubyKing & ArtMind
-The Lemon Spaghetti Dress
Lovely Clusters Spring Feature!
Recipe -  Summer Cookies
Eco-Craft – With Savage kitten
3 Ways To Dress Vintage
We Love Perth
Recreating Vintage Style
Vintage Recipies – 1948 Plum Pudding
Book Review – Cute Stuff
Summer Lovin
And much, much more!
 
You will receive one of the 1,000 limited edition - hand-numbered - print copies of Issue 4!

name: Black and White Floral - "cute as a button" Earrings - Small
description:
Design: Black and White Floral
Colour: Black background with a small white floral pattern.
 Hand crafted by Random Ally. These cute little earrings are covered with 100% cotton fabric and come in a variety of patterns.
The “cute as a button” buttons are placed on a lead and nickel free silver tone post and come with a rubber stopper.
Each pair = 2 earrings
Each earring = approx.  12mm across
This cute earring range also comes in a variety of patterns and a smaller size. So check them out in the accessories section of the store.
All pictures show examples of each style. No two pair will be exactly the same and will vary to some degree. But then that’s the fun of it!

name: Shooting Balloons - Womans Tee
description:
Design: Shooting Balloons

Colour: Apricot print on an asphalt tee

Fabric: 140GSM 50% Cotton 50% Modal
Pre-shrunk to minimise shrinkage

Style: This is a tee with a looser fit. Despite its roomy fit, this top is designed to flatter the figure. It features a scoop neck, shoulder to shoulder tape, and a longer length, making it one of the most stylish yet, comfiest tops around.
This fabric is soft and light, thanks to the combination of cotton and modal. Modal being a fabric made from the cellulose fiber of the Beechwood tree. A hardwearing, yet soft fabric.  A top quality, yet ethically made tee
This top was printed with water based, non-toxic inks

name: "Cute as a button" earrings (small)
description:
Hand crafted by Random Ally, these cute little earrings are covered with 100% cotton fabric and come in a variety of patterns.
The “cute as a button” buttons are placed on a lead and nickel free silver tone post and come with a rubber stopper.
Each pair = 2 earrings
Each earing = approx.  12mm across
Current styles are as follows
1.      Red spots with navy flowers
2.      Green with funky flowers
3.      Brown with cute green and white flowers
4.      Olive with little green bird
5.      Teal with brown
Please select your preference below.
These cute earrings also come in a larger size in a variety of patterns. So check them out in the accessories section of the store.
All pictures show examples of each style. No two pair will be exactly the same and will vary to some degree. But then that’s the fun of it!
